segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and it's a bit of a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast, and the sink is overflowing onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading down the cabinets and pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman there is just polishing a plate, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in the puddle with one foot wet, but no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of dishes are on the counter next to her, untouched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning my attention to the kids sneaking around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that shaky two-step stool, reaching into the open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so unstable, he could fall and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, arm up, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky while the adult isn't watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks perfect, which makes this inside mess even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one has turned off the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
